Name: PIEN & PAON plus
About the game: Run away from the mysterious monsters 'PIEN' and 'PAON'! A pop and cute horror game! ■About this game The 3D horror game 'PIEN' and its sequel 'PAON - BEYOND THE PIEN -' were released on the author's personal website in 2020 and caused a sensation in various places. These two games are now available for the first time on Steam as a single package! This Steam version includes extra elements that were not in the original version, as well as improvements to the ease of play. ■Included titles 1.'PIEN' / Explore a spooky abandoned house without being detected by the mysterious monster 'PIEN'! 2. 'PAON - BEYOND THE PIEN -' / The monster beyond the PIEN, 'PAON,' appears! ■Game Features The objective of the game is to erase the 'signs' scattered on the walls of the stage by illuminating them with a flashlight and chanting 'PIEN'. While you are being chased by PIEN, a very unique song 'Song of 'PIEN'' will be played. The new 'Custom' feature allows you to add your own favorite images to the game. If you clear both PIEN and PAON, you will be able to play an extra game.
